name: PlunderNauts
description:
EPIC SPACE BATTLES IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND!

Prepare for war, Captain! The unique combat gameplay in PlunderNauts™ is fast, easy-to-play and explosively fun! Pulverizing pirates with a fully-customizable starship never felt so good!

Did we mention the epic booty?!

>> Install PlunderNauts™, it's FREE!

The legend of Ironbeard is known throughout the Universe. For centuries, the cyborg pirate Ironbeard pillaged and plundered vast riches from countless galaxies. Now, greedy space pirates wage war across the cosmos, searching for Ironbeard’s Treasure.

And you, are a very...greedy...pirate!

GAME FEATURES:

• Master the exciting combat with intuitive, real-time controls
• Command and customize your starship & crew
• Plunder planets & hoard their treasures
• Collect loot to craft powerful weapons & upgrades
• Build a vast fleet of starships
• Navigate wormholes to explore distant galaxies
• Launch fighters to swarm your enemies
• Crush your adversaries with Cannons, Lasers, Torpedoes & more...

IMPORTANT: iPod Touch (4th Generation) & iPhone 4 are NOT supported.

IMPORTANT: Network connection required to play.

Published by: Backflip Studios
Designed & Developed by: LightBox Interactive

www.PlunderNauts.com
